name: Glow
description:
Make your elements glow.


Adds a smooth glow which mimics the inverse square falloff of a physical light source.


The glow effect is achieved by layering and easing multiple drop shadows layer effects.


Settings

By default, the plugin brightens the fill layer to match the corresponding glow color and intensity. This behavior can be disabled in the settings.
